message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product at the attractive price of $14,000. I believe this item would bring you significant value.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $12,500?
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your perspective, but $12,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet halfway between our offers at $13,250?
I'm not sure I'm willing to go up to $13,250. How about we try $12,000? I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer
